name: AuditLogComponent

inputsClass.name: source
inputsClass.rawdescription: The source ID for which audits will be shown in the list.
inputsClass.description: The source ID for which audits will be shown in the list.

inputsClass.name: type
inputsClass.rawdescription: The type of audit record to search for.
inputsClass.description: The type of audit record to search for.

propertiesClass.name: records
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Audit records retrieved from auditRecords endpoint.

methodsClass.name: ngOnInit
methodsClass.rawdescription: After page view is initialized, component gets audit records from auditRecords endpoint.
methodsClass.description: After page view is initialized, component gets audit records from auditRecords endpoint.

description:
Audit log component allows to show audits list. Component fetches audit records for the source object given as input.

Example

Example :
 <c8y-audit-log [source]="sourceId"></c8y-audit-log>
rawdescription:
Audit log component allows to show audits list. Component fetches audit records for the source object given as input.

**Example**

```html
 <c8y-audit-log [source]="sourceId"></c8y-audit-log>
```
